items.title: People With Extreme Wealth Should Give It Away—or Be Penalized
items.description: The gap between the ultra-rich minority and the vast majority has never been greater. But a wave of activist millionaires is asking for higher taxes.

items.title: 30% off Samsung Promo Codes - January 2025
items.description: Enjoy the latest deals from Samsung, like 30% off phones, $100 off every time a friend uses your referral code, up to $2,700 off TVs, and more.

items.title: 9 Last-Minute Deals on WIRED-Approved Gifts That Will Arrive In Time
items.description: These discounted tablets, headphones, and kitchen goods can still make it under the tree—if you hurry.

items.title: How Google Maps Makes It Harder for Palestinians to Navigate the West Bank
items.description: One user told WIRED that Google Maps directed them to “drive right into a wall that’s been up since 2003.”

items.title: The Best TV Shows You Missed in 2024
items.description: Diarra from Detroit, The Pradeeps of Pittsburgh—these are the shows you might not have watched in 2024, but definitely still should.
